title: NutriWise
subTitle: A mobile health application for diabetics.
description: This is a project done for my FYP. It is a mobile application made for diabetics. It allows the user to log and track their food, medication and insulin intake. The application also give users recommendations based on their input. You can find out more in the short documentation.
